column1: Kolk M.; Andersson L.; Pettersson E.; and Drefahl S. (2021). The Swedish Kinship Universe – A demographic account of the number of children parents siblings grandchildren grandparents aunts/uncles nieces/nephews and cousins using national population registers. Stockholm Research Reports in Demography 28. doi:10.17045/sthlmuni.17704988.v1.
The data includes the data from the study based on Swedish born indivudals resident in Sweden 2018. The data is from figure 11 in the working paper.
